x464010.teamb.srs

Class Registrar

  • java.lang.Object
    • x464010.teamb.srs.Console
      • x464010.teamb.srs.Registrar

  • public class Registrar
extends Console
    Registrar() class is the controller for scheduling students for courses and saving/retrieving registration records for the system.
    Version:
    1.6
    Author:
    William Crews, Amit Dhamija

      • loadRegistrationFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Registration> loadRegistrationFile()
        loadRegistrationFile() method load the student registration files into the system by reading the Registration.txt file and adding records from each line.

      • loadCourseFile

        public java.util.ArrayList<Course> loadCourseFile()
        loadCourseFile() method loads the Course File and all the course info into the system so that it can be used with the registration system for reading and writing registration info.

      • registerForCourse

        public boolean registerForCourse(int studentID,
                        java.lang.String courseID)
        registerForCourse() method is used to register a student for a course after passing a few checks. The checks implemented are: 1) Is course number entered in the system? 2) Is student already registered for course? 3) Is the class full, has it reached its max limit? After passing these checks the student is registered for the course and the information is saved in the Registration.txt file.
        Parameters:
        studentID -
        courseID -
        Returns:
        boolean true/false

      • isValidCourseID

        public boolean isValidCourseID(java.lang.String id,
                      java.util.ArrayList<Course> tempCourseList)
        idValidCourseID() method checks if the passed courseID is found in the courses list and returns true if found or false if not found.
        Parameters:
        id -
        tempCourseList - ArrayList of type Course to allow a course list to be passed into the method.
        Returns:
        boolean true/false

      • saveRegistration

        public void saveRegistration(Registration record)
        saveRegistration(Registration record) method saves a students registration to the Registration.txt file.
        Parameters:

      • saveCoursesAll

        public void saveCoursesAll(java.util.ArrayList<Course> regCourseList)
        saveCoursesAll(ArrayList regCourseList) method saves the entire course list object array to the file system overwriting any contents that was there. This is used after the courses student enrollment count has been update and needs to be saved back to the CourseList.txt file.
        Parameters:
        course - ArrayList of Course object records.

      • saveRegistrationsAll

        public void saveRegistrationsAll(java.util.ArrayList<Registration> studentRegList)
        saveRegistrationsAll(ArrayList studentRegList) method is used to save all student registrations in an ArrayList of type Registration to the Registration.txt file with records formated on each line using a comma delimiter format.
        Parameters:
        studentRegList - An ArrayList of type Registration.

      • myCourseSchedule

        public void myCourseSchedule(int studentID)
        myCourseSchedule(int studentID) method is used to display the courses the student is currently registered for. It will return a list with details about the course(s).
        Parameters:
        studentID - Students ID
